# include<iostream>
# include<math.h>
# include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,k,a[102],b[102],i,j;
	cin>>n;
	for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
	{
		cin>>k;
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
			cin>>b[i];
		sort(a,a+k);
		sort(b,b+k);
		long int sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
			sum+=abs(a[i]-b[i]);
		}
		cout<<"Case "<<j<<":"<<" "<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
